guidelines.daily_logs: Create memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md at start of each session; log approvals, blockers, results.
guidelines.long_term: Promote durable facts into MEMORY.md; reference PLAN.md and RUN_LOG for details.
guidelines.run_log: For Flow-mode work, append actions to workspace/multi-agent-coding-session/RUN_LOG.md.
guidelines.lint: scripts/lint_agents.py now auto-detects latest log or accepts --date flag.
